name: Shaman Odyssey: Tropic Adventure
summary:
Protect your villagers from ghosts, pirates, sharks and more. The people of your tribe are disunited for many years now. And although a tropical Laguna seems like a heavenly place to live, not everything is simple. Pirates are getting closer, sharks and surrounding islands, and storms and tornados are threatening peaceful villagers and their families.

It's up to you to give your best and help your people to reunite and build a new safe place to live.
